column4: probably the sound card is a onboard component of the nvidia chipset, using a sigmatel codec

no, i mean the pci id
lspci -n   (identify the line which is the card)

compare to the lspci output (without -n). identify the line in the lspci -n output which corresponds to the soundcard
the beginning of the lines should be the same
no, the vendor/product part of the line
